title: Your banning system
body: To be honest this system sucks because most of the time people who are toxic and provoked are either triggered by another player's gameplay or reaction and there is nothing for them to do you basically lose a game for something and they go on to feed next game and not care and this is why it is hard for us to climb out of bronze and silver you those people get nothing because they want to belong there and we have to stay with them because of there lack of interest and there is nothing you can report for.Which is also very triggering either raise the criteria for people to rank so only serious people will rank or after being reported for doing bad some games put them on a break yk?

replies.body:
The only definition i can find for that acronym that looks like it would fit makes almost as little sense as the others.

Upvoted for how do i shot web.

Somebody is going to do worse than the other people in every single game. There is no game where everybody goes positive. Being upset because someone on your team is worse than someone on the other team is no reason to flame them. You can be upset all you want, but flaming the person that is losing is only going to make them lose worse. If they are doing it on purpose they will probably enjoy the fact that you are mad and it will just put the rest of your team on tilt. There is no excuse for flaming somebody.
The best way to climb is to learn more in normals, learn your champions, learn your builds, and sometimes you may need to kindly, key word, kindly, share your advice to a teammate.
I get arogance everytime like a time i told a guy not to go Heimer into talon he insisted he was a beast and lost lane but we carried him
Well that happens. You cant control it

its hard to climb out of bronze and silver if you dont want to stop blaming your teammaates and put in effort and time to get better at your game play... 

you are in bronze and silver for a reason.... heres a hint ITS NOT CUZ OF YOUR TEAMMATES
So i am suppose to carry 4 people by myself smart.
sometimes yes... if you deserve to climb then you will be dominate over your enemies ...
all you need to do to get out of bronze is to git gud. its honestly not that hard for those that really want to git gud. So much resources out there to help.

>To be honest this system sucks because most of the time people who are toxic and provoked are either triggered by another player's gameplay or reaction

Then a lot of people need to grow up, learn some self control, and engage their brains before they start mindlessly bashing rage into the chat box where 9 other people have to read it.

Seriously. Not getting banned is a matter of applying "If you can't say something nice, say nothing". It's **not that hard**.
I was chat restricted for reacting and my argument was the same. Then I stopped reacting and started reporting. Suddenly I'm no longer getting in trouble. Hooray!
